tools.name: AddIssueCommentTool
tools.description: Adds a comment (note) to an issue.

tools.name: AssignToVersionTool
tools.description: Assigns an issue (UserStory recommended) to a Version. For UserStory, child Task/Bug/Test issues are also assigned. Start/due dates are auto-set based on version.

propagate_to_children.description: Propagate version and dates to children (default: true)

tools.name: CreateBugTool
tools.description: Creates a Bug (defect) issue. Example: 'Form validation not working'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

version_id.description: Version ID (inherits from parent if omitted)

assigned_to_id.description: Assignee user ID (defaults to current user)

tools.name: CreateEpicTool
tools.description: Creates an Epic (top-level category) issue. Example: 'User Journey'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

assigned_to_id.description: Assignee user ID (defaults to current user)

tools.name: CreateFeatureTool
tools.description: Creates a Feature (intermediate category) issue under an Epic. Example: 'CTA Button'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

assigned_to_id.description: Assignee user ID (defaults to current user)

tools.name: CreateTaskTool
tools.description: Creates a Task issue from natural language. Example: 'Refactor shopping cart'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

version_id.description: Version ID (inherits from parent if omitted)

assigned_to_id.description: Assignee user ID (defaults to current user)

tools.name: CreateTestTool
tools.description: Creates a Test (verification/QA) issue. Example: 'E2E test for registration flow'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

version_id.description: Version ID (inherits from parent if omitted)

assigned_to_id.description: Assignee user ID (defaults to current user)

tools.name: CreateUserStoryTool
tools.description: Creates a UserStory (user requirement/goal) issue under a Feature. Example: 'Build registration form'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

assigned_to_id.description: Assignee user ID (defaults to current user)

tools.name: CreateVersionTool
tools.description: Creates a Version (release milestone). Example: 'Sprint 2025-02 (due 2025-02-28)'

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

tools.name: GetIssueDetailTool
tools.description: Gets issue details, comments (update history), and child issues.

tools.name: GetProjectStructureTool
tools.description: Visualizes project hierarchy (Epic->Feature->UserStory). Useful for PMs to understand project structure.

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

status.description: Filter by status (open/closed, optional; include_closed recommended)

include_closed.description: Include closed issues (default: false, open only)

tools.name: ListEpicsTool
tools.description: Lists Epic issues in a project. Can filter by assignee and status.

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

tools.name: ListProjectMembersTool
tools.description: Lists project members. Use this to find assignee candidates.

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

tools.name: ListStatusesTool
tools.description: Lists available statuses. When project_id is specified, returns statuses available in that project's workflow.

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, returns all statuses if omitted)

tools.name: ListUserStoriesTool
tools.description: Lists UserStory issues in a project. Can filter by version, assignee, and status.

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

tools.name: ListVersionsTool
tools.description: Lists versions in a project. Default: open status only, sorted by due date ascending.

project_id.description: Project ID (identifier or numeric, uses DEFAULT_PROJECT if omitted)

tools.name: MoveToNextVersionTool
tools.description: Moves an issue (UserStory recommended) to the next Version (reschedule). Child Task/Bug/Test issues are also moved.

tools.name: UpdateCustomFieldsTool
tools.description: Updates custom fields of an issue. Fields can be specified by ID (number) or name (string).

custom_fields.description: Custom field values. Key is field ID or name, value is the new value. Example: {"Estimated Hours": "8", "Priority Level": "High"}

tools.name: UpdateIssueAssigneeTool
tools.description: Changes the assignee of an issue.

tools.name: UpdateIssueDescriptionTool
tools.description: Updates the description of an issue.

tools.name: UpdateIssueParentTool
tools.description: Changes the parent-child relationship of an issue. Set parent_issue_id to null to remove parent.

parent_issue_id.description: New parent issue ID (null or empty to remove parent)

inherit_version_and_dates.description: Inherit version and dates from new parent (default: false)

tools.name: UpdateIssueProgressTool
tools.description: Updates issue progress (done ratio). Specify an integer from 0 to 100.

tools.name: UpdateIssueStatusTool
tools.description: Updates issue status. Example: 'Open', 'In Progress', 'Closed'

tools.name: UpdateIssueSubjectTool
tools.description: Updates the subject (title) of an issue.
